column1: Little Goat Diner////Coming from Southwest China
column2: I actually have a pretty good handle on what Szechuan food is supposed to taste like
column3: and Little Goat hit the nail on the head with this one. Coupled with the biscuits and the sunny side egg
column4: this dish was interesting and complex both taste-wise and texture-wise. The strawberries kind of threw me off though. I didn't really understand their purpose but I ate them anyway and tried not to question their existence.
